Reviews.Title: Great product for the price.
Reviews.Author: L. Powell
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price. Requires some significant configuration to record video but has worked well in combination with the SmartSwitch with POE.

ProductInfo.Features:
H.264 megapixel camera
Advanced industrial design
Powerful performance and cost effective
Wall Mount/Ceiling Mount
30 FPS
1MP/HDTV 720p
4.0mm / F1.5
Powered through Ethernet
built in microphone
ProductInfo.Name: 3 Pack AirCam-Dome - H.264 megapixel camera, 1MP/HDTV Dome
